title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 8189.3 - Preliminary approvals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 8189.3 - Preliminary approvals

State Regulations

During the mapping program the following items must be
submitted to ORPTS for preliminary approval: (a) Prior to contracting for mapping surveys, a map indicating the flight lines for all scales of photography with the
general description of the method, plan and density of control. (b) Prior to contracting for mapping surveys, a map or maps showing the modular layout indicating by shading or other means
the mapping scales selected for all areas being mapped. (c) Prior to the preparation of base
manuscripts, a report showing the control used in the photogrammetric
procedures. (d) Prior to the final
preparation of a proposed tax map for the initial city, town or village in the
county being mapped, a completely drafted index map and typical section maps
for each scale of mapping being used. (e) Prior to the submission of tax maps for
approval pursuant to section
8189.15
of this Part, a typical format of the supporting information as specified in
section
8189.14
(a) of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
8189.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
